summary:
This mod slows your skill raising by one fourth or one fifth.
It is 1.5 friendly meaning smithing will level correctly according with mod.
descriptionHtml:
This mod slows your skill raising.
There are two files at the moment, one slows skill gain by one fourth, the other one by one fifth.
Choose the one you prefear and install only one!

It is 1.5 friendly meaning smithing will level correctly according with mod.

It will not alter max level or perks awaylability, it will only make leveling a lot slower, making you enjoy for more time the early levels.

INSTALL
Download with manager or manually download the .rar, unzip in your skyrim/data folder and check it in skyrim launcher data files.

CHANGELOG
1.0 Release
Still version 1.0 but started adding different speeds.
author: Ygolnac

files.name: Slower Leveling One Fifth Smithing Fixed
files.fileName: Slower Leveling One Fifth Smithing Fixed-13433-1-0.rar
